EmailTemplate.name: Cancelled due to non-payment
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Account Status - {!Account.Client_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Client_First_Name__c},
I tried giving you a call today to discuss your Yodle account but I wasn't able to reach you. I need to speak with you as soon as possible.
You currently have an outstanding balance of (unpaid balance), which is 30+ days past due. Your account has been cancelled due to non-payment. The outstanding balance from the (insert invoice date) invoice is the final payment needed to close the account in good standing.
Please call me at (877) 334-4321 so we can take care of your past due balance to prevent any further collection activity on your account. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.Last_Initial__c} Billing Consultant (877) 334-4321 customercare@yodle.com
